c74object.name: mubu.knn
c74object.description:
K-nearest neighbor search on matrix data of a MuBu container's track using a kD-tree.
The search can include matrix data of a given track over multiple buffers of a referred MuBu container. The buffers of the referred container that are included into kD-tree can be selected by the
include
and
exclude
messages. The object internally constructs a kD-tree from the included data.
The selection data is given as a float or list representing a scalar, vector or matrix corresponing to the matrix dimensions of the referred track. The kd-Tree search uses an Euklidian distance between the given selection data and the matrix data normalized by its standard deviation. Additionally, a weight can be defined for each matrix element (message
weights
) in order to scale their importance in the search.
As an option, the object can scale incoming selection data to the mean and standard deviation or to the minimum and maximum of the data included into the KNN search using the
scaling
attribute (typically applied to normalized input data).
The
minimum,
maximum,
mean
and
standard deviation
calculated over the included data at the construction of the kD-tree can be output using the messages
getmin
,
getmax
,
getmean
, and
getstddev
.
By default, the kD-tree is not updated automatically when the track content changes, but can be updated using the
update
message.
Initializing and changing the referred a MuBu container and/or track (messages and attributes
mubuname
,
trackid
, and
refer
) as well as setting the buffers included into the KNN search (messages
include
and
exclude
) automatically will cause the (re-)construction of the kD-tree.
Since the constructing the kD-tree may represent a considerable amout of calcultaion, it is recommend to carefully choose the moment when the kD-tree is constructed.

objarg.name: mubu name
objarg.digest: Name of the refered MuBu container
objarg.description: Name of the refered MuBu container.

objarg.name: track id
objarg.description: Identifier (index or name) of the refered track.

method.name: exclude
method.description:
Sets buffers (by index) that are excluded from the KNN search and reconstructs the kD-tree.
All other buffers of the referred MuBu container are included.

method.name: getexcluded
method.description: Outputs list of indices of buffers that are excluded from the KNN search.

method.name: getincluded
method.description: Outputs list of indices of buffers that are included in the KNN search.

method.name: getmax
method.description: Outputs the maxima of the matrix data included in the KNN search.

method.name: getmean
method.digest: Outputs mean values of included data
method.description: Outputs the mean values of the matrix data included in the KNN search.

method.name: getmin
method.description: Outputs the minima of the matrix data included in the KNN search.

method.name: getstddev
method.digest: Outputs standard deviation of included data
method.description: Outputs the standard deviation of the matrix data included in the KNN search.

method.name: include
method.description:
Sets buffers (by index) that are excluded from the KNN search and reconstructs the kD-tree.
All other buffers of the referred MuBu container are excluded.

method.name: refer
method.digest: Sets referred MuBu container and track
method.description: Sets referred MuBu container and track, and reconstructs kD-tree.

method.name: select
method.description:
Sets selection data and searches for k-nearest neighbors.
Lists of track element indices, buffer indices, and distances corresponing to the found neighbors are output from the first three outlets.

method.name: update
method.description: Builds the kD-tree from the referred tracks of the included buffers and calulates the minimum, maximum, mean, and standard deviation.

attribute.name: k
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of returned neighbors.

attribute.name: mubuname
attribute.description: Name of the referred MuBu container.

attribute.name: radius
attribute.description:
Sets the maximum distance of the returned neighbors (O sets radius to inifite).
The distance is normalized by the standard deviation of the data and additional weights.

attribute.name: scaling
attribute.description: Sets scaling mode for selection data [symbol: 'off' | 'minmax' | 'meanstddev'].

attribute.name: weights
attribute.description: Sets weights (for each matrix element) in KNN search.
